mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.content, i.price, i.size, i.img_url AS imgUrl, i.item_category_id AS itemCategoryId, c.item_category_name AS itemCategoryName FROM item_tb i INNER JOIN item_category_tb c ON i.item_category_id = c.item_category_id WHERE c.item_category_name = #{categoryName} AND (i.size = 15 OR i.size is Null)
